Title: Provides for a personal income tax deduction for expenses incurred for services rendered pursuant to an individual plan for employment certified by a rehabilitation counselor
Summary: Provides for a personal income tax deduction for expenses paid or incurred for services rendered pursuant to an individual plan for employment prepared by the office of vocational rehabilitation or commission for the blind and visually handicapped and certified by a rehabilitation counselor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing for a personal income tax deduction for certain vocational rehabilitation services expenses
